posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys Yeakley
(3) 1887 Scrapps cards (Foutz, Welch, Getzein) All three for $595

Frederick Mann (In the Old Judge Set) Original photograph with name written on the front, may or may not be an autograph.  Notation on Reverse reads, "Pittsburgh Base Ball Club, Frederick J. Mann".  $495

PH Mayo Brothers full color large lithographed trade card.  $39

1899 Trinity College Baseball Team Photograph  $79

(2) 1897 Yale University Photographs mounted on cardboard (original)of the Yale baseball and Football teams.  Football Cabinet is SOLD, Baseball cabinet is now $225.
